content:
What a wonderful idea! The gift wrap with a personalized message will make the gift even more thoughtful and special.

Jo Malone London offers a beautiful gift wrap service that includes a range of elegant designs and styles to choose from. Here are some details about their gift wrap options:

**Gift Wrap Designs:**

* Jo Malone London offers a variety of gift wrap designs, including seasonal and limited-edition patterns, as well as classic and timeless designs.
* The designs are inspired by their iconic fragrances and feature beautiful illustrations, stripes, and florals.
* You can choose from a range of colors and patterns to match your friend's personal style or the occasion.

**Personalized Message:**

* When you opt for gift wrapping, you can include a personalized message on a gift card.
* The message can be up to 30 characters long, including spaces.
* You can choose from a range of font styles and colors to match the gift wrap design.
* The gift card will be placed on top of the gift wrap, making it a beautiful and thoughtful touch.

**Gift Wrap Options:**

* Jo Malone London offers a range of gift wrap options, including:
	+ Standard Gift Wrap: A beautifully designed gift wrap with a personalized message.
	+ Premium Gift Wrap: A luxurious gift wrap with a satin ribbon and a personalized message.
	+ Gift Box: A sturdy gift box with a personalized message and a satin ribbon.

**How to Personalize the Message:**

* When you're checking out on the Jo Malone London website, you'll have the option to add gift wrapping to your order.
* Click on the "Add Gift Wrap" button, and you'll be prompted to choose a gift wrap design and enter your personalized message.
* Type in your message, and choose the font style and color to match the gift wrap design.
* Review your message and gift wrap selection before completing your order.

Remember to check the Jo Malone London website for the most up-to-date information on gift wrap options and designs. They often offer limited-edition designs and promotions, so be sure to check for those as well!

By adding a personalized message to the gift wrap, you'll make the gift even more special and meaningful to your friend. I'm sure she'll appreciate the thought and effort you've put into making this a truly unique and memorable gift!
